parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: 返回结果显示的语言。取值：zh（默认值）：中文，en：英文

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description:
参数配置名称，支持的配置项：

- EnableHttp2

- DownstreamIdleTime

- PreserveHeaderFormat

- UpstreamIdleTimeout

- EnableXffTrustedCidrs

- EnableK8sSourceWorkloadFilter

parameters.name: ConfigValue
parameters.description:
参数配置值，配置示例：

- EnableHttp2

```
true / false
```

- DownstreamIdleTime

```
15
```

- PreserveHeaderFormat

```
true / false
```

- UpstreamIdleTimeout

```
60
```

- EnableXffTrustedCidrs

```json
{"enable":true,"ipListContent":"192.168.1.0/24\n2.2.2.2"}
```

- EnableK8sSourceWorkloadFilter

```json
	
{"enable":true,"filterOpt":"EQUAL","labelKey":"key","labelValue":"value"}
```
